title: Wearable Technology-Enhanced Language MOOC Learning Experience Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills and intermediate-level language learning experience
context.additional_context: Non-real-time language learning environment using smartphone-based wearable technology (e.g., smartwatches), designed for learners without PC access.

learning_goals: Learners can achieve over 80% of weekly language learning goals using wearable technology.
Learners can double their learning engagement based on data collected via wearable devices.
Learners can enhance language application skills by over 30% through context-based learning (contextual learning) via wearable technology.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
